title: I have a new computer and would like to transfer my old account to it.  How do I do that
content: Transfer my Firefox account to a new computer
creator: jograyghost

title: Copy from Word to Web-forum via Firefox: Loss of formating
content:
Hi All, thanks for any help;

My issue is, I transfer a lot of long Word-97 generated text to various web-forums, which contain simple formatting (bold, italics, paragraph spacing, varied 'forum supported' fonts). When the text is copied, all the formatting is stripped in Firefox and only pasted as plain text.

Is there a way to copy and paste a document's text so the formatting is not removed?

p.s.: this is a browser issue, older browsers--like IE-11--copy the information fine (they have some paragraph vs. line issues (now, which is likely forum side), but otherwise work fine.)

Is there a way to paste text with formatting in firefox?

Thanks for your help!

K2
creator: k2kellyirie

title: Jak zvětšit panel při ukládání záložky?
content:
Jak zvětšit panel, třeba i na celou stránku? viz obrázek, abych viděl, když mám těch záložek třeba 50 (složek) jich víc a neměl to takhle mini? abych to nemusel jednoduše dát jako záložku a pak jít do záložek samostatně a tam si to přendavat do správné složky? děkuji.

obrázek v odkazu, bohužel se mi nenačetl zde ani ve dvou prohlížečích. Screenshot
creator: Weetek

title: Cleared cache accidentally. Can I recover bookmarks?
content: I accidentally cleared the cache. Now all bookmarks are gone. Is there anyway to get them back?
